Bringing NFTs to Life, Activating the Value of Companionship

NFTVF is a revolutionary platform that empowers NFTs with a brand-new value attribute: companionship. By linking your NFT to a unique, interactive virtual avatar, NFTVF activates the companionship value of NFTs, transforming your digital collectibles from mere static images into a genuine part of your life.

Telegram-planeX-twitter
NFT Virtual Friends

We believe that NFTs are more than just digital assets; they can become partners with emotional value. The NFTVF platform connects NFTs to a constantly growing virtual avatar, providing NFT holders with a unique companionship experience and pioneering a new dimension of NFT value.

Key Features

NFT Binding & Animation

Bind your NFT to a unique virtual avatar, bringing your NFT to "life."

Growth & Evolution

The growth rate of the virtual avatar is linked to the trading volume and floor price of the bound NFT. The higher the trading volume and floor price, the faster the virtual avatar grows. You can also feed your avatar $NFTVF tokens to accelerate its growth.

Interaction & Rewards

Once the virtual avatar reaches a certain stage of maturity, you can interact with it daily to earn $NFTVF token rewards. The virtual avatar acts as a perpetual mining machine, providing you with continuous earnings.

Diamond Hand Incentive

Through interaction and continuous earnings, users are incentivized to hold their NFTs long-term, becoming true diamond hands.

Showcase & Sharing

Showcase your virtual avatar on the platform and share your companionship experience with friends.

Roadmap

Phase 1

Platform Foundation

Build the core framework and website.
Launch the initial $NFTVF token.

Phase 2

Interaction & Growth

Launch website V2 and DApp, enabling NFT binding and virtual avatar generation. Develop interactive features for the virtual avatar, such as conversation, games, etc. Implement the connection between the virtual avatar and NFT market data, linking the avatar's growth to the NFT's performance.

Phase 3

Community & Ecosystem

Establish the NFTVF community, allowing users to share their virtual avatars and interact. Collaborate with other NFT projects to expand the application scenarios of NFTVF.

Phase 4

Metaverse Integration

Integrate NFTVF virtual avatars into metaverse platforms, allowing users to interact with their avatars within the metaverse.

Your NFT's journey to becoming a true companion starts here.
